name: Runner naughty child
description:
************** Runner naughty child **************
Runny , Runny , Runny
Move level to next level and take coins.
This game is for less 10 years old .
We hope can make good memory for baby.

Also featuring Game Center feature built-in!

~ Universal App - iPhone, iPhone5, iPod Touch, iPad & iPad Mini Compatible!

~ Nice Graphics!

~ Best Sound and Music!

~ Play vs Friends Score challenge feature!

~ Game Center Feature!
